tasks.description: Collect website data (HTTP headers, response bytes, page resources).
Perform performance analysis (load time, compression, caching, optimization).
Conduct usability analysis (layout, accessibility, mobile responsivity).
Calculate overall grades (performance, usability, composite score).
Generate a detailed performance report (charts, recommendations, export options).
Provide API integration for external tools or services.
Store and retrieve historical results for analytics and trend monitoring.
Authenticate user via Fitbit OAuth2 to obtain access tokens.
Retrieve real‑time activity metrics (steps, distance, calories, heart rate) from Fitbit API.
Store and manage user activity records in a secure backend.
Render activity dashboards and visual insights within the app.
Generate inactivity alerts or activity reminders and push notifications.

Social interaction features: posting, commenting, likes, follows, and chats

Configure and display the Google Maps instance for ocean data visualization.

Convert retrieved data into map overlays or layers for visual representation.

Allow users to share map views or specific data points via URLs or social media.
Manage API keys and authentication for Google Maps and Marinexplore data endpoints.
Ensure responsive performance and handle API errors gracefully.

Perform OAuth authentication with Twitter.
Retrieve the list of friends (accounts the user follows).
For each friend, request the latest tweets.
Trim each friend’s tweet list to the first ten items and format for UI.
Search for tweets using query text, language, and optional date ranges.
Filter tweets by geographic bounding boxes or time‑zone centroids.
Retrieve tweet metadata (user info, media URLs, timestamps).
Provide a GeoJSON or similar spatial data format for rendering on an interactive Earth map.
Stream live tweets in real time for selected time zones or geographical areas.
Retrieve weather data from external APIs
Merge and reconcile multiple weather data sources
Determine user location (IP geolocation or manual input)
Render a simple visual UI (icons, charts, map) to display weather info
Capture and validate the user’s place input
Resolve the place name to geographic coordinates using a Google Location API
Fetch the weather forecast for the resolved coordinates via Google Weather API

Compose the tweet text from the forecast data, ensuring it meets character limits and is meaningful

Persist and query user‑created spot data (coordinates, titles, timestamps).
Authenticate users and manage friend relationships.
Retrieve and display nearby events/gigs for a user’s favorite artists.
Recommend gigs based on user preferences and proximity.
Notify or share spot/event updates with friends (social/messaging layer).
Initialize and render the Google Map with existing place markers.
Search and retrieve geolocation data for a place based on user input in the right‑side box.
Handle ‘Next’ navigation to load and display the next four places.
Provide drawing tools that let the user add or edit four new places directly on the map.

Media Distribution – publish and stream PSAs and campaign videos.
Campaign Analytics – track metrics such as donation totals, traffic, engagement.
Social & Marketing Promotion – enable sharing, ads, and marketing automation.

Blocklist Evaluation – Query a maintained blocklist and enforce harsh handling for violators.
Time‑of‑Day Filtering – Block or allow calls based on configurable hours or schedules.
Personal Contact & Close‑Friend Matching – Compare caller ID against the user’s personal contact list and identified close friends.
Do‑Not‑Call Registration Integration – Communicate with political and marketing organizations to add the user’s number to their do‑not‑call lists.

Verify that the meeting is still scheduled and contact the originator to confirm.
Initiate outbound voice calls to all participants using their registered phone numbers.
If any participant cannot be contacted, generate a temporary call-in number and secure PIN.
Send an SMS to the participant's cell phone containing the temporary call-in number and PIN.
